translation: They are possessed of the deceitful nature of demons and undivine beings, filled with vain hopes, vain actions, and vain knowledge that is senseless.
commentary: 9.12 Moghashaḥ of vain hopes? Moghakarmanah of vain actions? Moghajnanaḥ of vain knowledge? Vichetasah senseless? The monster devilish? demonic undivine? f and? Eve verily? Prakritim nature? Mohinim deceitful? Shritah (are) possessed of.Commentary They entertain vain hopes? for there can be no hope in perishable forms. It is vain hope because they run after transient objects and miss the Eternal. It is vain
